# Functions and Modules


## Modules


```elixir
defmodule MyModule do
  def my_function(arg1, arg2) do
    # ...
  end
end
```

## Struct


```elixir
defmodule Candidate do
    defstruct [name: "qiushi", age: 18]
end

c = %Candidate{name: "tom"}
#> %Candidate{name: "tom", age: 18}
```


## Anoynmous Functions

```elixir
square = fn x -> x * x end
square.(5)
#> 25
```
